name: Pump unit FAS NZ 60-11-4 for water with following spec.
description:
Pump type : NON SELFPRIMING, HORIZONTAL,UNIT

CONSTRUCTION TYPE
Execution : COMPLETE WITH MOTOR
Material execution : standard execution
Counter flanges : WITHOUT

OPERATING DATA
Pumped liquid : water
without solids and
non-aggressive to material of construction
Working temperature [°C] : 20
Density [kg/dm³] : ca. 1,0
Kinematic viscosity [mm²/s] : ca. 1,0
Nominal rate of flow QN [m³/h] : 60
Nominal head HN [m] : 11
Nominal pump power input PN [kW] : 2,95
Nominal speed of rotation nN [1/min] : approx. 2.900
Max. perm. pressure at outlet branch [bar] : 10

MATERIAL OF CONSTRUCTION
Casing : 'EN-GJL-250
Impeller : 'EN-GJL-250
Shaft : 1.4057
O-Ring : EPDM
Shaft sealing : mechanical seal 433.6420
Sealing material : carbon-SiC-EPDM
Inlet branch : DN125/PN16/DIN EN 1092-2
Outlet branch : DN100/PN16/DIN EN 1092-2
Number of stages : 1
Sense of rotation as seen on pump shaft
extension : ANTI CLOCKWISE

MOTOR
Motortype : THREE PHASE A.C. MOTOR
Motor brand : TO OUR CHOICE
Power [kW] : 4,6
Voltage [V] : 220 Dreieck / 380 Stern
Frequency [Hz] : 50
Enclosure : IP 55
Insulation class : F
ptc thermistors : incl. PTC
Special execution : ATEX II2G Ex e II T3
Painting : RAL 9006 2K PUR-HIGH-SOLID-WHITE ALUMINIUM

Incl. Set of welding counter flanges made of VA 1 piece
(DN125 / DN 100 - PN 16) with screws and seals
